item.title: Knowledge Acquisition
item.description: Knowledge Acquisition Knowledge acquisition should come in 2 forms - deliberate and free-flowing. Deliberate knowledge acquisition in 3 fields Personal: Observe our patterns of behavior, and understand whether or not it aligns with goals one has set for himself. Observing oneself also inevitably brings to light one’s strengths and weaknesses, and allows the opportunity to experiment with them. [[Journaling]]. [[Quantified self]]. [[Mindfulness]]/[[Metacognition]] Professional: In real life, one must earn a living.
